namespace RazorGenerator.Core.Test
{
    using System;
    using System.Collections.Generic;
    using System.IO;
    using System.Linq;
    using System.Net;
    using System.Text;
    using System.Web;
    using System.Web.Helpers;
    using System.Web.Security;
    using System.Web.UI;
    using System.Web.WebPages;
    using System.Web.WebPages.Html;
    
    [System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("RazorGenerator", "v.v.v.v")]
    [System.Web.WebPages.PageVirtualPathAttribute("~/WebPageTest.cshtml")]
    public class WebPageTest_cshtml : System.Web.WebPages.WebPage
    {

                // Resolve package relative syntax
                // Also, if it comes from a static embedded resource, change the path accordingly
                public override string Href(string virtualPath, params object[] pathParts) {
                    virtualPath = ApplicationPart.ProcessVirtualPath(GetType().Assembly, VirtualPath, virtualPath);
                    return base.Href(virtualPath, pathParts);
                }
        public WebPageTest_cshtml()
        {
        }
        public override void Execute()
        {
WriteLiteral("\r\n\r\n<p>\r\n");

    
     if (DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Friday) {

WriteLiteral("        ");

WriteLiteral(" Friday! Friday! Friday!\r\n");

    }
    else {

WriteLiteral("        ");

WriteLiteral(" There\'s ");

               Write(((DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek - DayOfWeek.Friday) + 7) % 7);

WriteLiteral(" days to go before Friday.\r\n");

    }

WriteLiteral("</p>");

        }
    }
}
